metadata.title: Thursday, 18th June, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    why the construction of the Freedom Park Shopping Mall in Kitwe has stalled;
(b)    who the owners of the Mall are;
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d)    what the way forward on the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when the rehabilitation of the following roads in Kafulafuta Parliamentary Constituency will commence
parts: (a)    Chankute to Mutaba;
(b)    Mishikishi to Mbotwa; and
(c)    Itatelazo to Bangwe.
(a)    when the construction of Ilola Health Post in Nakonde Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b)    how much works are still outstanding; and
(c)    how much money is required to complete the works.

questions.minister: Minister of Tourism and Art how often animals and birds in game parks are cropped.
Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when the following primary schools in Mkaika Parliamentary Constituency will be rehabilitated
parts: (a)    Nyembe;
(b)    Walila;
(c)    Chankhanga; and
(d)    Mnyamanzi.
(a)    when construction of the Bangweulu Hospital in the Northern Province will commence;
(b)    who the contractor for the project is;
(c)    what the time-frame for the project is; and
(d)    what major components will constitute the Hospital.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when the contractor constructing the Mitete Secondary School will be paid; and
(b)    when the construction works will be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    whether there are any potential sites for mining activities in Mpongwe District;
(b)    if so, what minerals are found in the District;
(c)    whether any large scale exploration of minerals has been carried out in the District; and
(d)    if so, what the findings are.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    which contractor constructed the Kampondo-Kapongolo-Chanyalubwe road in Lumezi Parliamentary Constituency;
(b)    whether the contractor was issued with a certificate of completion and, if so, which authority issued the certificate;
(c)    whether the Government is satisfied with the works done and, if not, whether the contractor will be recalled;
(d)    why culvets were not installed across streams on the road; and
(e)    whether the contractor has been paid for the works.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when the rehabilitation of the following bridges in Kabompo West Parliamentary Constituency will commence
parts: (a)    Nyela;
(b)    Dishiwu;
(c)    Kasombo;
(d)    Kalwilo, connecting Kabompo to Zambezi District;
(e)    Kasalya Washe;
(f)    Chifuwe South, connecting Chifuwe South to Kabompo Township;
(g)    Mushivi; and
(h)    Chikokwelo.
